s: May 9, 2024 - “I wanted to focus on design. I wanted to focus on building the brand, and I wanted to focus on my family.” · Craft has his sights set on bringing innovative mixology tools to new and different consumer bases in the United States and ultimately globally, with Amazon as a partner.

Elevated Craft was founded by entrepreneur and designer, Adam Craft. The company designs and manufactures products that empower people to create unforgettable experiences. Elevated Craft launched its flagship product, the Elevated Craft Cocktail Shaker, on Kickstarter in October 2019.
